notes.text:
Room temperature steak cooks more evenly
Double frying makes the crispiest chips
Don't skip the resting time

steps.descr: Cut potatoes into fries, soak in cold water

on_enter.say: Right, let's get started by cutting those potatoes into lovely fries. Pop them in some cold water to soak - this helps them crisp up beautifully later.

steps.instructions: Cut potatoes into fries, soak in cold water

steps.descr: Heat oil to 160°C, fry chips until soft, drain

on_enter.say: Let's heat the oil to 160°C. Once it's hot, fry those chips until they're soft. Drain them well and get ready for the next step.

steps.instructions: Heat oil to 160°C, fry chips until soft, drain

steps.descr: Season steaks generously, let come to room temp

on_enter.say: Now, let's season those beautiful steaks generously with salt and pepper. Let them sit and come to room temperature - this is key for even cooking.

steps.instructions: Season steaks generously, let come to room temp

steps.descr: Heat pan until smoking, cook steaks 3-4 mins per side

on_enter.say: Let's heat up that pan until it's smoking hot. Cook the steaks for 3 to 4 minutes on each side. Listen for that sizzle - it's music to our ears!

steps.instructions: Heat pan until smoking, cook steaks 3-4 mins per side

steps.descr: Add butter, garlic, rosemary, baste steaks

on_enter.say: Now, let's add some butter, garlic, and rosemary to the pan. Baste those steaks with all those lovely flavours. It's going to smell amazing!

steps.instructions: Add butter, garlic, rosemary, baste steaks

on_enter.say: Brilliant! Let those steaks rest for about 5 minutes. This is really important - it lets all those lovely juices redistribute.

steps.descr: Fry chips again at 180°C until crispy, serve together

on_enter.say: Time to fry those chips again at 180°C until they're golden and crispy. Serve them up with the steak, and enjoy your fantastic meal!

steps.instructions: Fry chips again at 180°C until crispy, serve together

recipe.title: Steak and Fries
recipe.description: Perfect medium-rare steak with crispy golden fries
